entry.title: $2300 // Spacious 3bedroom in bedstuy steps from the C train
entry.content:
Beautiful 3 BR/1 bath apartment in historic Bedford Stuyvesant, prime location!

This 3 bedroom apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedrooms, updated kitchen with plenty of storage/counter space, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.

You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Diamond Reef, L'Antagoniste, Peaches Hot House, Saraghina, Chez Oskar, Oaxaca Tacos, The Wilky, Essence, Bed-Wyne Cocktail, Casablanca Cocktail Lounge, Dynaco.

Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only 2 blocks from the C train at Ralph, and a 4 minute walk to the JZ trains at Chauncey.

No brokers fee!

Contact to schedule your appointment today!

Call/text for fastest response - 8o*5(2:5>2(6o]30
